Grace Devoe

  1. Foster Name: Grace Gafford
  2. Foster Family: Charles C. and Mary F. Gafford
  3. Location of Family: Wymore, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Wymore, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 6
  7. Date of Birth: 6/22/1900, Ulster, NY
  8. Date of Death: 11/6/1984
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Grace Scott
  11. Spouse Name: Dudley Scott
  12. Source: "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; 1920 United States Federal Census; The Weekly Wymorean, 30 March 1905; Crossroads June 1990, n.p.
